commit.message:
IPA C++ refactoring fix.

	* cgraphunit.c (compile): Correct function used.
        * rs6000.c (rs6000_xcoff_declare_function_name): Correct symtab_node funtion used.
        (rs6000_xcoff_declare_object_name): Likewise.
